post.body: sweett jesusman not THUNDER CATS!!! Their 80s antics crushed the very soul of ronald reagan
is that so... Like taking a trip to bunny land to make a live bunny coat... Its like a warm comfy massager.
if u really want to i think i have connections
did u steve jobs take your soul forcibly with a spooknife
... I hear when if u give it cocaine it makes compies fast
psssh not that long i had like 50,000 took less than an hour... And thanks fer checkin it was nice
2 things: 1st u dont get butt seckeds in lady jail... Its worse. 2nd rip the music onto ure compy
noooo! They got u ... I guess its revenge
be careful youll be craving more chinese food before you know it
Does any one do pants delivery cuz i need a new pair.
The cure comming on... Soooo close..... Stooppid sound check bring on the cure already... Ok, finish first then bring on the cure!
I am ready to see the cure!!!
I think house fires were the original X-mas lights
Dreams of fighting robotic hobos... Pretty awesome... But having dumbass partners to die not as much fun
If the McDonald's Moon Man came to my house tonight with a big Mac I think I would assume the form of him seeing as how I am next in line...
I really want to get away from everything. Someone find me an escape
That dastardly moon man with his space car and insatible apetite for big macs. He truly defined an era and literally captured many a hearts.
I believe the mcdonald's moon man said it best when he stated "Hey kid why don't you go get mouth fucked by a yetti!"
I just past a row of mexican workers... All sleeping... Ah sterotyoes you never cease to amaze me
I feel cut off and it seems like no one exists right now
If i wanted to i think i could probably destroy the world... But that would be to simple.
A possible art show next month... hope I finish my work in time. Maybe I'll just solidify Twinkies and put googly eyes on em wif pop stix.
Joy upon joy has landed hard on my head... Hope it last
Try this out make a cardboard cut out of yourself and have it stand at a park and observe what happens to it.
Time travel... if I could I think I would have destroyed the Earth by now
